name: Iveri: The 1.000 Story (Mia Blais-Côté) (Mia Blais-Côté) (Mia Blais-Côté)
name_original: Iveri: The 1.000 Story (Mia Blais-Côté) (Mia Blais-Côté) (Mia Blais-Côté)
description:
“Iveri: The 1.000 Story” is a brief and very-to-the-point story about a woman (default name Iveri) who volunteer to be the next sacrifice to protect her village from demonic attacks. 1-2 min reading in total. 1k words One Shot story. 

You can choose the name, hair and eyes color of the main character. You can also choose the demon' name. 2 easy to get endings.
